title: How long did Eddie Van Halen have cancer before passing away? - Quora

response.answer_text: He had cancer as far back as 2000. But that was tongue cancer which was said to have been gone by 2002. He kept this pretty quiet for a long time. Legendary Guitarist Eddie Van Halen Dies from Throat Cancer The cancer that took his life was throat cancer. Most reports say it was a long battle. It’s stated he was receiving treatment for this in 2019

Eddie was diagnosed with tongue cancer in 2000. He had it removed and took treatments and was declared healed in 2002. Five years ago the cancer returned. He had been fighting it since then. He will be missed.
